definition: to stop/to pause/to arrange/to lay out/to kowtow/to stamp (one's foot)/at once/classifier for meals, beatings, scoldings etc: time, bout, spell, meal

pinyin: Pa4 li4 si1 · Xi1 er3 dun4

sentences.english: I will stay at the Hilton Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 我将住在希尔顿大洒店。

sentences.english: You could stay in Hilton Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 你可以住在希尔顿饭店。

sentences.english: Paris Hilton had an alleged prowler at her house this week.
sentences.chinese: 这周，在帕里斯希尔顿家发现了一所谓的小偷。

sentences.english: Good morning. This is Steve of the Hilton Hotel, La Pizzeria Restaurant speaking.
sentences.chinese: 早安，我是希尔顿饭店意大利餐厅的史迪夫。
我下榻在希尔顿大饭店。

sentences.english: The University of Surrey's visual media research group is headed up by Professor Adrian Hilton.
sentences.chinese: 萨里大学的视觉媒体研究小组的领导者是希尔顿教授。

sentences.english: Certainly, Mr. Deng. Hilton Hotel, Room 579?
sentences.chinese: 没问题，邓先生，希尔顿579号房吗？

sentences.english: Hello. Could you tell me the telephone number of the savings office near Hilton Hotel?
sentences.chinese: 您好。你能告诉我希尔顿饭店附近的储蓄所的电话吗？

sentences.english: However, menthol flavors are still permitted, Healton pointed out.
sentences.chinese: 然而，希尔顿指出，薄荷香料卷烟却仍然得到允许。

sentences.english: Am I all right for Hilton on this road?
sentences.chinese: 我到希尔顿走这条路对吗？

sentences.english: Can you send a taxi to the Hilton Hotel?
sentences.chinese: 可以派辆车到希尔顿饭店来吗？

sentences.english: Slough decided they wanted to keep Mr Hilton anyway — and Mr Howard then suspended the association.
sentences.chinese: 斯劳人决定留下希尔顿，霍华德于是取消了这个协会。

sentences.english: How much is a taxi from the Sears Tower to the Hilton Hotel?
sentences.chinese: 从希尔斯大楼到希尔顿饭店计程车费是多少？

sentences.english: Could you ask him to call me at the Hilton hotel room number 597.
sentences.chinese: 请您叫他打电话到希尔顿酒店597房来找我。

sentences.english: Please contact me at the Hilton Hotel, Room 731.
sentences.chinese: 请联络我住的希尔顿饭店731室。

sentences.english: This is located in Paddington London Hilton.
sentences.chinese: 这是设在伦敦的帕丁顿希尔顿。

definition: the catering industry/the hotel and restaurant business
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
